artist: Itō Shinsui; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: walking woman wearing a black coat with flowers at hem, holding a brown and tan umbrella; snow on tree at L and trees in background and on column at R
marks: 昭和五年庚午冬 {Shōwa gonen kanoeuma fuyu} (Winter 1930) 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: The Grounds of a Shrine in Snow
